alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Madison; Oconee; Oglethorpe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Oconee, Clarke, northwestern Oglethorpe and southwestern Madison Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 310 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Lexington to State Botanical Garden Of Ga, and moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Watkinsville, Lexington, Athens, Winterville, Crawford, Arnoldsville, Hull, Athens-Clarke County, Whitehall, James Holland Youth Sports Cmpx, Smithonia, Beechwood Hills, Sandy Creek Recreation Area, Hutchings, Barretts Mill, Dunlap, State Botanical Garden Of Ga and Point Peter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
